block.p: ROTKER-Martin. Beloved husband of Elaine. Dear father of Ronnie (Abraham) Deutsch, Allen, Steve (Joy), Glenn (Nancy). Survived by grandchildren Michelle, Benjamin, Jonathan, Rachel, Jennifer, Lindsay, Alicia, Harry and great-grandson Jordan. Funeral services, 1:00 PM, Sunday, August 20, Weinstein Chapel, 1652 Central Park Avenue, Yonkers, NY. Interment, Sharon Gardens Cemetery.
